column1: Now it came to pass on the third day
column2: that Esther put on her royal apparel
column3: and stood in the inner court of the king's house; and the king sat upon his royal throne in the royal house
column4: over against the gate of the house. And it was so
column5: when the king saw Esther the queen standing in the court
column6: that she obtained favour in his sight; and the king held out to Esther the golden sceptre that was in his hand. So Esther drew near
column7: and touched the top of the sceptre. Then said the king unto her
column9: Queen Esther? and what is thy request? It shall be given thee even to the half of my kingdom."And Esther answered
column10: "If it seem good unto the king
column11: let the king and Haman come this day unto the banquet that I have prepared for him."Then the king said
column13: that he may do as Esther hath said."So the king and Haman came to the banquet that Esther had prepared.
